definitions.definition: having a particular colour or different colours

examples.text: He uses ink and coloured pencils in his drawings.
The street was ablaze with coloured lights.
She was wearing a cream-coloured suit.
The words are written in a different-coloured ink.
She wore a richly coloured silk dress.

definitions.definition: a word used to describe a person who is not white, which is now considered offensive
(in South Africa) having parents who are of different races
